enumDescriptions.StateHostLane1: Indicates the state of Host Lane 1 for data path operations.
enumDescriptions.StateHostLane2: Indicates the state of Host Lane 2 for data path operations.
enumDescriptions.StateHostLane3: Indicates the state of Host Lane 3 for data path operations.
enumDescriptions.StateHostLane4: Indicates the state of Host Lane 4 for data path operations.
enumDescriptions.StateHostLane5: Indicates the state of Host Lane 5 for data path operations.
enumDescriptions.StateHostLane6: Indicates the state of Host Lane 6 for data path operations.
enumDescriptions.StateHostLane7: Indicates the state of Host Lane 7 for data path operations.
enumDescriptions.StateHostLane8: Indicates the state of Host Lane 8 for data path operations.

enumLongDescriptions.StateHostLane1: Indicates the state of Host Lane 1 for data path operations.
enumLongDescriptions.StateHostLane2: Indicates the state of Host Lane 2 for data path operations.
enumLongDescriptions.StateHostLane3: Indicates the state of Host Lane 3 for data path operations.
enumLongDescriptions.StateHostLane4: Indicates the state of Host Lane 4 for data path operations.
enumLongDescriptions.StateHostLane5: Indicates the state of Host Lane 5 for data path operations.
enumLongDescriptions.StateHostLane6: Indicates the state of Host Lane 6 for data path operations.
enumLongDescriptions.StateHostLane7: Indicates the state of Host Lane 7 for data path operations.
enumLongDescriptions.StateHostLane8: Indicates the state of Host Lane 8 for data path operations.

enumDescriptions.Deactivated: Data path is deactivated or the lane is unused.
enumDescriptions.Deinit: Data path is in de-initialization state.
enumDescriptions.Init: Data path is in initialization state.

enumLongDescriptions.Activated: This state indicates that the data path for the lane is fully active and operational.
enumLongDescriptions.Deactivated: This state indicates that the data path for the specified lane is not active. The lane may be unused or intentionally disabled.
enumLongDescriptions.Deinit: This state indicates that the data path is being de-initialized, shutting down or resetting the lane from an active state.
enumLongDescriptions.Init: This state indicates that the data path is undergoing initialization procedures, preparing the lane for activation.
enumLongDescriptions.Initialized: This state indicates that the data path initialization process has completed successfully, but the lane may not yet be fully activated.
enumLongDescriptions.TxTurnOff: This state indicates that the transmit portion of the data path is in the process of being disabled.
enumLongDescriptions.TxTurnOn: This state indicates that the transmit portion of the data path is in the process of being enabled.

DellNetworkTransceiverPortMetrics.description: The DellNetworkTransceiverPortMetrics represents the statistics of the Network Transceiver.
DellNetworkTransceiverPortMetrics.longDescription: The DellNetworkTransceiverPortMetrics represents the statistics of the Network Transceiver.

enumDescriptions.BitErrorRatioResultsSupported: Indicates support for reporting Bit Error Ratio (BER) results.
enumDescriptions.BitsAndErrorsCountingSupported: Indicates support for counting bits and errors during diagnostics.
enumDescriptions.HostSideFEC: Indicates support for reporting Forward Error Correction (FEC) status on the host side.
enumDescriptions.HostSideInputSNRMeasurement: Indicates support for measuring input Signal-to-Noise Ratio (SNR) on the host side.
enumDescriptions.MediaSideFEC: Indicates support for reporting Forward Error Correction (FEC) status on the media side.
enumDescriptions.MediaSideInputSNRMeasurement: Indicates support for measuring input Signal-to-Noise Ratio (SNR) on the media side.

enumLongDescriptions.BitErrorRatioResultsSupported: This capability enables the device to calculate and report BER results as part of diagnostic measurements.
enumLongDescriptions.BitsAndErrorsCountingSupported: This capability allows the device to count transmitted bits and errors for diagnostic analysis and performance monitoring.
enumLongDescriptions.HostSideFEC: This capability allows the device to report FEC status and related diagnostic information for the host side.
enumLongDescriptions.HostSideInputSNRMeasurement: This capability enables the device to measure and report input SNR values for the host side for diagnostic purposes.
enumLongDescriptions.MediaSideFEC: This capability allows the device to report FEC status and related diagnostic information for the media side.
enumLongDescriptions.MediaSideInputSNRMeasurement: This capability enables the device to measure and report input SNR values for the media side for diagnostic purposes.

enumDescriptions.GreaterThan20ms: Gating support accuracy is greater than 20 milliseconds.
enumDescriptions.LessThanOrEqual20ms: Gating support accuracy is less than or equal to 20 milliseconds.
enumDescriptions.LessThanOrEqual2ms: Gating support accuracy is less than or equal to 2 milliseconds.
enumDescriptions.NotSupported: Gating support accuracy is not supported.

enumDescriptions.HostSideInputLoopback: Enables input signal loopback on the host side.
enumDescriptions.HostSideOutputLoopback: Enables output signal loopback on the host side.
enumDescriptions.MediaSideInputLoopback: Enables input signal loopback on the media side.
enumDescriptions.MediaSideOutputLoopback: Enables output signal loopback on the media side.
enumDescriptions.PerLaneHostSideLoopbacks: Supports loopback functionality for individual lanes on the host side.
enumDescriptions.PerLaneMediaSideLoopbacks: Supports loopback functionality for individual lanes on the media side.
enumDescriptions.SimultaneousHostAndMediaSideLoopbacks: Allows simultaneous loopback operations on both host and media sides.

enumLongDescriptions.HostSideInputLoopback: Enables input signal loopback on the host side.
enumLongDescriptions.HostSideOutputLoopback: Enables output signal loopback on the host side.
enumLongDescriptions.MediaSideInputLoopback: Enables input signal loopback on the media side.
enumLongDescriptions.MediaSideOutputLoopback: Enables output signal loopback on the media side.
enumLongDescriptions.PerLaneHostSideLoopbacks: Supports loopback functionality for individual lanes on the host side.
enumLongDescriptions.PerLaneMediaSideLoopbacks: Supports loopback functionality for individual lanes on the media side.
enumLongDescriptions.SimultaneousHostAndMediaSideLoopbacks: Allows simultaneous loopback operations on both host and media sides.

enumDescriptions.FlatMemory: Indicates that memory is organized as a single flat address space without paging.
enumDescriptions.PagedMemory: Indicates that memory is organized in pages and requires page selection for access.

enumDescriptions.PRBSCheckerHostSidePostFEC: Indicates support for PRBS checking on the host side after FEC.
enumDescriptions.PRBSCheckerHostSidePreFEC: Indicates support for PRBS checking on the host side before FEC.
enumDescriptions.PRBSCheckerMediaSidePostFEC: Indicates support for PRBS checking on the media side after FEC.
enumDescriptions.PRBSCheckerMediaSidePreFEC: Indicates support for PRBS checking on the media side before FEC.
enumDescriptions.PRBSGeneratorHostSidePostFEC: Indicates support for PRBS generation on the host side after FEC.
enumDescriptions.PRBSGeneratorHostSidePreFEC: Indicates support for PRBS generation on the host side before FEC.
enumDescriptions.PRBSGeneratorMediaSidePostFEC: Indicates support for PRBS generation on the media side after FEC.
enumDescriptions.PRBSGeneratorMediaSidePreFEC: Indicates support for PRBS generation on the media side before FEC.

enumLongDescriptions.PRBSCheckerHostSidePostFEC: This capability allows the device to check PRBS patterns on the host side after Forward Error Correction for error detection and diagnostics.
enumLongDescriptions.PRBSCheckerHostSidePreFEC: This capability allows the device to check PRBS patterns on the host side prior to Forward Error Correction for error detection and diagnostics.
enumLongDescriptions.PRBSCheckerMediaSidePostFEC: This capability allows the device to check PRBS patterns on the media side after Forward Error Correction for error detection and diagnostics.
enumLongDescriptions.PRBSCheckerMediaSidePreFEC: This capability allows the device to check PRBS patterns on the media side prior to Forward Error Correction for error detection and diagnostics.
enumLongDescriptions.PRBSGeneratorHostSidePostFEC: This capability allows the device to generate PRBS patterns on the host side after Forward Error Correction for diagnostic purposes.
enumLongDescriptions.PRBSGeneratorHostSidePreFEC: This capability allows the device to generate PRBS patterns on the host side prior to Forward Error Correction for diagnostic purposes.
enumLongDescriptions.PRBSGeneratorMediaSidePostFEC: This capability allows the device to generate PRBS patterns on the media side after Forward Error Correction for diagnostic purposes.
enumLongDescriptions.PRBSGeneratorMediaSidePreFEC: This capability allows the device to generate PRBS patterns on the media side prior to Forward Error Correction for diagnostic purposes.

title: #DellNetworkTransceiverPortMetrics.DellNetworkTransceiverPortMetrics
